description:
Employer Industry: Scientific Research

Why Consider this Job Opportunity:
- Salary up to $144,500
- Opportunity for career advancement and growth within the organization
- Remote work within the United States considered for experienced candidates
- Comprehensive benefits package that supports overall well-being and career growth
- Mission-driven and team-oriented work environment
- Opportunity to work on cutting-edge facilities and engage in research and development

What to Expect (Job Responsibilities):
- Conduct research on critical material supply chains using machine learning and artificial intelligence technologies
- Analyze flowsheets for critical materials relevant to batteries to strengthen domestic supply chains
- Work with the Project Lead to prioritize ideas for improving industry and markets
- Develop and apply analytical approaches, compile results, and prepare reports and publications
- Collaborate with the team to communicate impactful research outcomes in peer-reviewed journals

What is Required (Qualifications):
- Advanced degree (Masters or PhD) in science or engineering with a focus on modeling and analysis
- Minimum of 3 years of experience in the field or equivalent education
- Familiarity with lithium-ion batteries and materials supply chains for batteries
- Excellent skills in data analytics, machine learning, and development of actionable analytical tools
- Strong written and oral communication skills

How to Stand Out (Preferred Qualifications):
- Experience in lithium-ion batteries and/or next-generation battery chemistries
- Familiarity with critical minerals and materials supply chains for batteries
